attributes.action: Hold a referendum regarding digital ID
attributes.additional_details: I believe that digital ID will be extremely life changing for everyone on a scale similar to brexit. If brexit can have a referendum why not this? Allow the people to have their say and vote directly for a matter this important.
attributes.background: Hold a referendum regarding digital ID to allow the people to directly vote on such a massively lifestyle changing policy.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition, which calls for the same action: "Hold a referendum on introducing mandatory identity cards in the UK" https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/734246
